newsitem.title: USA: Muni dealers traded $846 mln bonds Friday - MSRB.
newsitem.headline: Muni dealers traded $846 mln bonds Friday - MSRB.

text.p: Municipal bond dealers traded $845.8 million of bonds Friday on 3,462 trades, the Municipal Securities Rulemaking Board said.
A total of 2,006 individual issues changed hands, with 122 of those trading four or more times, MSRB said, citing figures from an automated clearance system of interdealer trades.
